ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource , "Channel Partner"),AND(ISBLANK(RW_Broker__c), RW_Apply_Unregistered_Broker__c == false,$Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/),false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the broker name or enter Unregistered broker details.
